name: files.completeUploadExternal
desc: Finishes an upload started with files.getUploadURLExternal

blocks.desc: A JSON-based array of structured rich text blocks, presented as a URL-encoded string. If the `initial_comment` field is provided, the `blocks` field is ignored.

channel_id.desc: Channel ID where the file will be shared. If not specified the file will be private.

channels.desc: Comma-separated string of channel IDs where the file will be shared.

files.desc: Array of file ids and their corresponding (optional) titles.

initial_comment.desc: The message text introducing the file in specified channels.

thread_ts.desc: Provide another message's `ts` value to upload this file as a reply. Never use a reply's `ts` value; use its parent instead. Also make sure to provide only one channel when using 'thread_ts'.

errors.access_denied: User is not the owner of the file.
errors.file_not_found: Could not find the file from the upload ticket.
errors.file_update_failed: Failure occurred when attempting to update the file.
errors.invalid_blocks: Provided blocks are in the incorrect format.
errors.invalid_channel: Channel could not be found or channel specified is invalid.
errors.not_in_channel: User/bot membership is required for the specified channel.
errors.posting_to_channel_denied: User is not authorized to post to channel.
errors.channels_limit_exceeded: Exceeded the channel limit. A maximum of 100 channels is allowed per request.
